alert.note: Alert for Northeast Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 09 at 4:37AM PST until December 10 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 1 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches are expected with 5 to 10 inches possible over the mountains. The heaviest snow amounts are expected to occur Saturday night into early Sunday morning. * WHERE...Sandpoint, Metaline, Schweitzer Mountain Road, Athol, Priest River, Clark Fork, Fruitland, Colville, Deer Park, Newport, Tiger, Bonners Ferry, Ione, Orin-Rice Road, Eastport, Flowery Trail Road, Kettle Falls, Chewelah, Metaline Falls, Springdale-Hunters Road, and Northport. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 1 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on winter driving conditions and snow covered roads.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Idaho, for the latest road information in Idaho, call 5 1 1. In Washington, for the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel
